name: Discover Box
description:
Discover Box is a click and point game where you need to find the right item in a dark room. 

Controls :

Move the mouse to find objects.

Left click to select the right object. 

Other Credits: 

Wave Piano Synth Loop by Alexander.

Sound Effects made from Chiptone: https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

BabyDoll font by Denise Bentulan
